entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
